alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 4:04AM PST until January 13 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches in mid elevations and 8 to 12 inches along mountain ridgelines. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Northern Elko County and Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combination of continuous snow showers and gusty winds will create hazardous driving conditions in the advisory area. A westerly wind will also create crosswind concerns along US 93. Use extra caution if traveling through the advisory area.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range
